name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, specializing in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, **Kafka**, and **KStreams**. Proficient in leveraging modern technologies such as **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **Azure DevOps** to deliver robust and scalable solutions. Solid understanding of microservices architecture and event-driven systems, combined with experience in implementing secure user authentication with **Keycloak**.
Skilled in frontend technologies including **React**, **TypeScript**, and **JavaScript** along with design frameworks like **Material-UI** and state management libraries such as **Redux**. Familiar with CI/CD practices and project management tools such as **Jira** and **Confluence**.
Experienced in the healthcare and financial sectors, ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Strong background in AI/ML with practical experience in deploying cloud-native solutions on **AWS** and **Azure** and managing workflows using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
